title: Phase 2.5: Merge AgentType+AgentAdapter into Harness
description: Merge the two separate interfaces (AgentType and AgentAdapter) into a single Harness interface with per-harness packages. Rename agent_type to agent_harness throughout. Nest harness config in YAML under agent_harness section. GenericHarness becomes a proper implementation with internal output collector. Design doc: docs/plan-agent-harness-refactor.md
